text:
Listing 15.23: Example of preparing data for ﬁtting the MLP model.
We can now deﬁne and ﬁt the model with the provided conﬁguration.
# define model
model = Sequential()
model.add(Dense(n_nodes, activation=' relu' , input_dim=n_input))
model.add(Dense(1))
model.compile(loss=' mse' , optimizer=' adam' )
# fit model
model.fit(train_x, train_y, epochs=n_epochs, batch_size=n_batch, verbose=0)
Listing 15.24: Example of deﬁning an MLP model.
